price: 63. Taip buvo nugręžti tie, kurie neigdavo Allaho Ajat (įrodymus, įkalčius, eilutes, pamokas, ženklus, apreiškimus ir t. t.)
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yu'faku alladhīna kānū biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
